## IParsedPackageName.unscopedName property

The parsed NPM package name without the scope.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unscopedName: string;
```

## Remarks

For example, if the parsed input was "<!-- -->@<!-- -->scope/example", then the name would be "example".
